name: Chpt 5 Outtake | Danganronpa V3 | Tumblr Dashboard
description:
I dug through some files from drv3 and found this unused sprite!!
jokes aside, I've seen a sprite someone edited with Kaede holding a gun and decided to do one with Kokichi. It turned out pretty decent, so I made it into a tumblr theme. Hope you like it! ;^)

user.name: Mili Bean
user.about:
Hi, my name is Mili and I'm danganronpa trash.
(I only do styles for Tumblr.)
I hope you enjoy my styles!
